package.name: cups-prep
package.install: if grep -E '^lp:' /etc/passwd ; then echo 'User lp found in /etc/passwd' else useradd -c "Print Service User" -d /var/spool/cups -g lp -s /bin/false -u 9 lp fi if grep -E '^lpadmin:' /etc/group ; then echo 'Group lpadmin found in /etc/group' else groupadd -g 19 lpadmin fi mkdir -p /etc/lesslinux/packages touch /etc/lesslinux/packages/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}_just_prepares_passwd_for_cups
